definitions: To keep safe or rescue (someone or something) from harm or danger.
To store up or keep for future use.
To avoid spending or using (money, time, or other resources).
To prevent (a goal) from being scored in sports.
To make or keep (data) on a computer or other device.
examples: The lifeguard saved the drowning child.
She saves money every month for a down payment.
Using a shortcut will save us time.
The goalkeeper made a brilliant save.
Remember to save your document frequently.
